pref_directory.tooltip:
Choose a directory with files and/or folders in it.
The files will be used to create the menu items.
The folders will be used to create sub-menus.

pref_customtooltip.tooltip: Set a custom tooltip for the applet.

pref_customicon.tooltip: Set a custom icon for the applet.

pref_applet_title.tooltip: Set a custom title for the applet.

pref_hotkey.description: Keyboard shortcut to open and close the menu

pref_icon_for_menus.tooltip: Set a custom icon for the applet.

pref_style_for_sub_menus.tooltip: Set a custom style for the sub-menus.

pref_style_for_menu_items.tooltip: Set a custom style for the menu items.

pref_autoupdate.tooltip:
If enabled, the applet will monitor the main folder for added/deleted/renamed files/folders and rebuild the menu.
If disabled, the menu will have to be updated manually from its context menu.

pref_show_only_desktop_files.tooltip:
If enabled, only .desktop files will be used to create the menu.
If disabled, all file types will be used to create the menu.

pref_show_hidden_files.tooltip: If enabled, hidden files will be used to create menu items.

pref_show_hidden_folders.tooltip: If enabled, hidden sub folders will also be used to create sub-menus.

pref_show_submenu_icons.tooltip: If disabled, all sub-menu items will be created without icons.

pref_show_applications_icons.tooltip: If disabled, all menu items will be created without icons.

pref_use_different_icons_for_sub_menus.description: Allow sub-menus to each have their own icon
pref_use_different_icons_for_sub_menus.tooltip: Read this applet help for details about this option usage (Applet context menu > Help item).

pref_sub_menu_icons_file_name.description: Name for the file containing the icons for sub-menus
pref_sub_menu_icons_file_name.tooltip: Read this applet help for details about this option usage (Applet context menu > Help item).

pref_ignore_sub_folders.tooltip: If enabled, the sub folders found inside the main folder will be ignored and sub-menus will not be created.

pref_auto_close_opened_sub_menus.tooltip:
If enabled, the previously opened sub-menu will be automatically closed.
It will only work with sub-menus created at the first level. Sub-menus inside other sub-menus are not affected.
